snippet.title: Im Bann Der Dunklen Jagd [Trailer] | A cooperative investigation game
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3232660/Im_Bann_Der_Dunklen_Jagd/

In "Im Bann Der Dunklen Jagd", you take on the role of a detective in an exciting, cooperative game for two players. Explore a dark and eerie environment, gather clues, and solve puzzles as the pressure mounts. With an intense atmosphere and captivating sound design, every second is filled with suspense. Are you ready to uncover the secrets of the darkness?

Check Out My Steam DevPage: https://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=smi.
Follow Me on Twitter for Sneak Peeks: https://x.com/FabianSmi
☕ Ko-Fi Support: https://ko-fi.com/smigames
